question: It is OK to work in I.T. department of a bank?
answer:
QUESTION
If I have a job in Information Technology Department (computer related work, hardware and software, inter branch connectivity of branches) of a bank then is that Salary Halal ? Although this work helps in promoting bank business.
ANSWER


Share:
The salary for working in the IT department of the Bank will be Halaal.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
